explanation: The original condition used x%100==0 which checks whether x is divisible by 100 (i.e., last two digits are 00). The intended test was to check whether x ends with a single 0 (divisible by 10). I fixed that single line by changing 100 to 10; all other lines remain identical.
fixed_code:
x = int(input())
print('Yes' if x%10==0 else 'No')
